Welcome to Climatology Analysis Tools's documentation!
======================================================

Climatology Anaylsis Tools project is started to help you to analyze climate datasets using python.
The result of this project is ZXCV package.
ZXCV package has only been tested with Python 3.8.9 environment.

ZXVC requires NumPy, Pandas, Xarray, SciPy, Matplotlib, Cartopy.  

.. code-block::

   pip install numpy pandas xarray scipy matplotlib cartopy


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   zxcv
